pages.text: Durability is how much damage your Vault Weapon, Armor, or Tool can take before breaking.$(br2)The type of Vault Gear determines how it takes damage : Weapons by attacking mobs, Armor by receiving damage, and Tools by using them.
Durability can be replenished on a piece of Vault Gear by combining it with a Repair Core in an anvil.$(br2)This will consume a Repair Slot on the Vault Gear, however.
